results.title: Metformin mediates cardioprotection against aging-induced ischemic necroptosis
results.text_hl: Importantly, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment prevented the decrease in @GENE_TFEB @GENE_21425 @@@TFEB@@@ abundance and nuclear @GENE_TFEB @GENE_21425 @@@TFEB@@@ levels upon @<m>DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@I/R injury@@@ in aged hearts (Figure 6a,b).
